text: René Vautier (15 January 1928 – 4 January 2015) was a French movie director. His movies were about many issues, such as the Algerian War, French colonialism in Africa, pollution, racism, women's rights, and apartheid in South Africa. His best known works were Afrique 50 and Avoir 20 ans dans les Aurès. ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2015 deaths Category:French movie directors Category:People from Finistère
title: René Vautier
